description:
Allows ConsoleZ settings to be installed from a provided URL. 		
	To use, you will need to call Chocolatey like so:
		
		choco install ConsoleZ.Settings -params 'url=https://yoursite.com/console.xml'

I recommend using the -Force flag for subsequent settings updates.
summary: Allows ConsoleZ settings to be installed from a provided URL
author: Jason Capriotti
